title: 🔵PRIVATE POOL BEAUTIFUL HOME, VIEWS 🌄
posting_body: ['CONTACT COREY for MORE INFO, PICS', 'TEXT CODE: OC22048661MR & your name to', 'show contact info', 'Or call or email me', "IF THIS PLACE DOESN'T FIT,", 'ASK ABOUT OUR EXTENSIVE LIST OF', 'OTHER PROPERTIES / RENT / BUY / SELL /', 'LUXURY ESTATES / HOUSES /', 'COMMERCIAL / APARTMENTS', "*and we'll assist you through the entire process!*", 'House For Rent 1 Year+', '$20,000 / Per Month', '5 Beds', '5 Baths', '4,290 SqFt', 'A beautiful private and exclusive location | A real Beverly Hills lifestyle*', 'This contemporary Mediterranean-style house fully upgraded is nested in the serene hillside with canyon and city light views from its living spaces.', 'As you drive into your private gate front yard you will find an elegant double door entry opening to a grand - inviting open floor living area.', 'The open kitchen boasts the finest finishes and fixtures with Wolf oversized pro-grade 6-burner range and Sub Zero refrigerator/freezer, custom cabinets, and two large islands.', 'A true chef s kitchen.', 'The spacious dining room and living room open to an entertaining backyard with a pool/spa, built-in outdoor kitchen, fire pit, and more.', 'A secondary master suite and two guest rooms with a shared bath are located on the main level.', 'The dramatic wrought iron staircase takes you to the upper level which features an overly spacious master bedroom with its own private balcony, a nice size walking closet, and a gorgeous master bathroom.', 'The second room upstairs is designed for an office or a personal gym with its own balcony.', 'The surround sound system throughout this home, the private gated guest parking, and the fabulous resort backyard create a true entertainment environment.', 'This home is in close proximity to a renowned array of shopping, dining destinations, top-tier public and private schools, beautiful parks, hiking trails, film studios, and much more.', 'This home is a true state of living.', '*** Text Code: OC22048661MR & your name to', 'show contact info', 'For Details & Photos***', 'And check out my website: <URL>/', 'Brought to you by Corey Trevor at Los Angeles Area - eXp Realty of California, Inc.', 'CA DRE#01878277 Listing Agent by Monique Brown First Team Estates DRE#: 01008773']
